_header: Listen and listeneth and harkeneth aright
_description: The Cook’s Tale of Gamelyn — 902 lines in couplets

BodAsh45III.First Lines:
Lithen & lestneth and herkeneth a rightAnd ye shul heren of a
                    doughti knightSir Iohn of Boundis was his right nameHe coude of
                    norture & mochel of game…
BodAsh45III.Last Lines:
…And soe shal we alle mai ther no man fleGod bringe vs to the
                    Ioie that euere shal be
BodAsh45III.Note:
Seventeenth century; transcribed by Ashmole. Recto fols. 3 and 5-8 have
                    a running title — ‘The Coke’, f. 4 — ‘The Cokes
                    Tale’, fols. 9-18 ‘Gamelyn’.
BodAsh45III.Attributed Title: Here begynneth ye Cokes tale Gamelyn (f. 2v)

BodBar20.First Lines:
Lithen and listneth and herkenyth ariȝtAnd ȝe shul here
                    of a doughti kniȝt…
BodBar20.Last Lines:
…And so shal we alle may þer no man fleGod bryng vs to
                    þe Ioy þat euer more shal be amen
BodBar20.Attributed Title:
The Coke…Gamelyn (RT); Here endith þe Cokes tale and here
                    bygynnyth þe prolog of þe man of law (f. 62v)

BodHatDon1.First Lines:
Sit and lysthen & herkeneth a rightAnd ye shal her of a doughti
                    knight…
BodHatDon1.Last Lines:
…And so shall we all may þer no man fleGod god bring vs
                    to þe ioy that ever shal be Amen
BodHatDon1.Attributed Title:
The Cokes tale (RT); Here endeth þe Cokes tale of þe prentise of
                    londoun… (f. 75v)

BodRawPoe149.First Lines:
…Two gentilmen gouerned the placeCome to gamelyn god yeve hem
                    good grace…
BodRawPoe149.Last Lines:
…And so shal we al ther may no man fleGod bryng vs to the ioy
                    that euer shal be
BodRawPoe149.Attributed Title: The Coke (RT); Here endith the cokes tale… (f. 58)

OxfChrCh152.First Lines:
Lithen & lystenyth & herkenyth a rightAnd ye shul heren of
                    a doughty knyght…
OxfChrCh152.Last Lines:
…And so shall we alle may there noman fleeGod brynge vs to the

OxfCCC198.First Lines:
LIthen & lesteneþ and herkeneþ arightAnd ȝe
                    schulle heeren of a doughty knight…
OxfCCC198.Last Lines:
…And so schal we all may þer noman fleeGod bring vs to
                    þe Ioye þat euer schal be

Follows the Cook’s Tale with ‘Incipit

                    opening the text.

OxfTri49.First Lines:
Now lithe and lystenyth so god geue you goode fyneand ye
                        schulle here gode game of yonge Gamelynexxiij
an
youngemen that helde hem ful bolde[These lines crossed out and
                    ‘vacat’ written in the margin, followed by:]Lith and lestenyth
                    and herkenyth a rightand ye shullen here of a doughty
                    knyght…
OxfTri49.Last Lines:
…and so schulle we alle may ther no man flegod bring vs to his
                    ioie that euere schall be amen
OxfTri49.Attributed Title:
Incipit ffabula de Gamelyn (f. 60v); Coke (RT);
                        Explicit fabula de Gamelyn… (f. 73)

BLHar1758.First Lines:
…All the londe that he hadde it was purchasffayn he wolde it
                    were dressid among hem alle…
BLHar1758.Last Lines:
…Than seide Adam that lokkes had horeCristes curs mote he haue
                    that hym bond so sore…

PierpontM249.First Lines:
Sitheth and lesteneth and herkeneth arightAnd ye shul here of a
                    doughty knyght…
PierpontM249.Last Lines:
…And so was his wyf and shul weGod brynge vs to the ioye that
                    ever shal be
PierpontM249.Note:
Follows Cook’s Tale fragment, with added couplet,
                    ‘But here of I wol passe as now / And of yonge Gamelyn I wol telle
                    yow’ (f. 62)

TokyoTak32.First Lines:
Lythes and lestenyht & herkenyht a RyghtAnd yee
                    shall here of a dowghty knyght…
TokyoTak32.Last Lines:
…And syhtthyn was Gamelyn graven vnder movldeAnd soo schall
                    wee alle May ther no man fleeGod bryngge to thee ioye that evere schall
                    beeExplicit Gamelyn
TokyoTak32.Attributed Title:
Here bee gynnyht Gamelyn (f. 45); Explicit Gamelyn (f. 51); Gamelyn
                    (RT)
